channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Service-Focused SaaS And AI Are Transforming Latin America's Business Landscape
item.description: Latin America's rise in services and the region's unique user behavior create a fertile environment for SaaS innovation.

item.title: Getting clear about brand value

item.title: Who Owns AI Output? Why Recent Cases Against OpenAI Could Redefine Copyright
item.description: OpenAI is at the center of a copyright debacle that could shape the future of content creation and publishing discourse.

item.title: What DEI Bans In Colleges Might Look Like For Health Care Providers

item.title: Checking all the boxes
